verbs.description: [ARG0: ProPublica] [V: obtained] [ARG1: audio of Central American children sobbing after authorities separated them from their parents at the US - Mexico border] . More than 2,300 children have been separated from their parents since April , when the Trump administration launched its " zero tolerance " immigration policy .
